name: blood-drip
description: Horror-themed visual effects for VS Code - animated blood drips from errors and spooky TODO icons

commands.title: Blood Drip: Toggle Blood Drip Effect
Blood Drip: Toggle Spooky TODO Icons
Blood Drip: Toggle All Haunting Effects

bloodDrip.bloodDripEnabled.description: Enable blood drip animation on error lines

bloodDrip.todoIconEnabled.description: Enable spooky TODO icons in the gutter

bloodDrip.todoIconVariant.description: Select the spooky icon variant for TODO markers

bloodDrip.candlelightEnabled.description: Enable candlelight mode (dims lines away from cursor)

bloodDrip.ghostCursorEnabled.description: Enable ghost emoji that follows your cursor

bloodDrip.codeKillerEnabled.description: Enable code killer animation when deleting large blocks of code
